title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 15
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 15
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Ampco-Pittsburgh (AP). Ampco-Pittsburgh Corp.'s may be headed for their biggest loss in three years after the specialty-steel maker suspended its dividend. The company had made quarterly payouts since at least 1980, according to data compiled by Bloomberg. Ampco-Pittsburgh's decision followed a 50 percent cut last year, to 9 cents a share.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
